title: One Piece Episode 328 Recap
author: Adult Swim Squad
description: A detailed recap of Episode 328 including plot summary, character analysis, and a rating of 3.5 out of 5 crazy icebergs. Reviews Puzzle's awakening, the flashback to the New World defeat, and the Straw Hats' escape from the icebergs.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Ice Hunter Arc (episodes 326-335)

title: Episode 62: Ice Hunter Arc Pt. 1
author: Fun Piece Podcast
description: A podcast episode covering the Ice Hunter Arc including discussion of bad parenting and how overpowered the Straw Hats are in this filler arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Ice Hunter Arc

title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 3 -- Ice Hunter, Spa Island & Movie Tie-Ins
author: Blackjack Rants
description: A critical review of the Ice Hunter Arc describing it as 'extremely safe, and honestly... pretty boring.' Reviews the Phoenix Pirates storyline, the Accino Family as villains, and criticizes the arc's extended length and generic execution.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for the Ice Hunter Arc

title: One Piece | Ice Hunter Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers
description: A comprehensive review of the Ice Hunter Arc that rates it poorly, stating it's 'only worth watching if you are a completionist' and describes it as 'mostly forgettable filler that has no bearing on the future plot.' Rates the saga 2/10 for characterization and development.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for the Ice Hunter Arc
